sales.test ride: I had an amazing test ride experience. The bike handled perfectly and the staff explained every feature clearly.
sales.delivery: The delivery process was smooth and on time. The staff made the handover special.
sales.staff behaviour: The sales team was polite and professional throughout my visit.

service.pickup: Pickup service was prompt and hassle-free. They collected the bike right from my doorstep.
service.technician: The technician diagnosed the issue quickly and fixed it perfectly.
service.washing: The washing quality was excellent and the bike looked brand new after service.
